references.paper_title: Probabilistic Graphical Models: Principles and Techniques
references.reason: This foundational textbook provides a comprehensive overview of probabilistic graphical models, which are central to the paper's topic.
This book is a classic and highly cited work on graphical models, laying the groundwork for many concepts used in the paper.

references.paper_title: Sparse inverse covariance estimation with the graphical lasso
references.reason: This paper introduces the graphical lasso, a fundamental method for estimating sparse Gaussian graphical models, which is extended in this paper.
This seminal paper introduces the concept of fairness through awareness, which is foundational to discussions of fairness in machine learning and inspires the fairness metrics in this paper.
This early paper introduces the concept of covariance selection, a precursor to many modern methods for estimating Gaussian graphical models, including those used in this work.
